alert.note: Alert for Kennebec; Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 12:16PM EST until December 21 at 1:32PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Kennebec and Sagadahoc Counties. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Somerset and Kennebec Counties. Sandy River At Mercer affecting Somerset and Franklin Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Skowhegan. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 160,000.0 cfs, Water is over the Margaret Chase Smith Bridge on Route 201 in Skowhegan. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EST Tuesday the flow was 28,493.0 cfs. - Forecast...The river will crest this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday morning. - Flood flow is 35,000.0 cfs. - Flood History...No available flood history. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
